class.name: VideoStreamWebm
class.description: [VideoStream] resource handling the [url=https://www.webmproject.org/]WebM[/url] video format with [code].webm[/code] extension.

method.name: get_file
method.description: Returns the WebM video file handled by this [VideoStreamWebm].

method.name: set_file
method.description: Sets the WebM video file that this [VideoStreamWebm] resource handles. The [code]file[/code] name should have the [code].webm[/code] extension.
